sentences.english: He is at enmity with his neighbours.
Do not shake your rugs on your neighbor below.
sentences.chinese: 不要在樓下鄰人的頭頂上抖牀毯。

sentences.english: "It would", says Mr Lin, "be the heavenly dynasty all over again, and the barbarians coming to worship.
sentences.chinese: 中國將重新成爲天朝聖國，野蠻鄰人對其敬仰朝拜。

sentences.english: His neighbours ask him to build one still smaller.
sentences.chinese: 它的鄰人要它去造一個更小的。

sentences.english: I have lied in admitting the disgusting charges laid against my Order.
sentences.chinese: 我再那些對我的信仰鄰人作嘔的指控上撒了謊。

sentences.english: It was very generous of them to share their meal with their out-of-work neighbors.
sentences.chinese: 他們願意讓失業的鄰人共享餐食，真的十分慷慨。

sentences.english: My neighbor knows the height and weight of the high jacked freight.
sentences.chinese: 我鄰人知道被挾制貨船的高度和重量。

sentences.english: His neighbor's wife was deeply touched by his kindness.
The whole neighborhood started gossiping about how he died.
sentences.chinese: 鄰人開始紛紛議論起他的死因來。

sentences.english: The next-door neighbors are amiable people.
sentences.chinese: 隔鄰鄰人們都是和顏悅色的人。

sentences.english: The doer recognizes his own and his neighbor's inestimable worth simultaneously.
sentences.chinese: 施者會同時認知到他自己與鄰人不可估量的價值。

sentences.english: Never tell your neighbors to wait until tomorrow if you can help them now.
sentences.chinese: 你現在有力量幫助鄰人，就不要叫他等到明天。

sentences.english: The original dog collar neighbors out when he get lost.
sentences.chinese: 本來鄰人在領狗外出地時分，他本身跑丟啦。

sentences.english: Then, turning to his sister: "Sister, never a precaution on the part of the priest, against his fellow-man.
sentences.chinese: 妹妹，教士永遠不可提防他的鄰人。

definition: Guoxing or Kuohsing township in Nantou county 南投縣|南投县[Nan2 tou2 xian4], central Taiwan
to condemn in speech and in writing (idiom)/to denounce by word and pen
lit. to return the jade annulus to Zhao (idiom); fig. to return something intact to its rightful owner
to have a clear view of things/to adapt to circumstances
